contents:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 28th day of January, 1986, the petition for allowance of appeal is granted and the order of Superior Court is reversed and the order of the Court of Common Pleas of Allegheny County is reinstated.
ZAPPALA, J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
McDERMOTT, J., dissents from the summary disposition of this matter.
